title: Gerald Kein - Painless Childbirth
description:
Complete Painless Childbirth Program

Program Length
7 hrs. 5 min.
Four DVD's



Learn This Outstanding Five Session Self-Hypnosis Program Developed
For The Hypnotist Working With Prospective Mothers For Pain Free Delivery!

* Discover why it is not necessary for the hypnotist to be present at the birth.
* Learn how to teach the mother to reject negative semantics of traditional health care providers, family and friends in her daily life.
* Learn how to alleviate any fear the mother may have of the birthing process.
* Gain the knowledge necessary to teach the mother how to anesthetize herself for the birthing process.
* Learn how to increase or decrease the mother's lactation.
* Learn techniques to control or eliminate postpartum depression in the new mother.
* Plus, So Much More!

DVD #1 - 2 hrs. 8 mins.

A complete training workshop. You can learn, step by step, Jerry's highly successful five session program. It offers easily learned techniques for you to train your client for a happy, pain free birth.

DVD #2 - 2 hrs. 12 mins. ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ DVD #3 - 1 hr. 50 mins.

You will see Jerry utilizing the program with a client. These two DVDs include five sessions from the initial visit to the post-birth interview, demonstration of the techniques learned in the complete workshop on DVD #1. DVD #3 also offers rare "live" video of the actual birth using hypnosis as the only anesthesia!

DVD #4 - 53 mins.

This very special pre-talk was developed for the prospective mother who might be considering hypnotism for childbirth. This DVD helps educate and remove any fears or misconceptions the prospective mother might have concerning participation in a self-hypnosis childbirth program. This highly educational program is a must for every hypnosis practitioner's resource library!
